  • ichor.core.common.sorting package
  • View page source

ichor.core.common.sorting package

Subpackages

  • ichor.core.common.sorting.natsort package

Module contents

natsort is used to sort things like atom names. The code is vendored from the natsort python package (see https://pypi.org/project/natsort/), but it is made to work in ICHOR without having to download the extra dependency.

ignore_alpha(x)
